snippet.title: INFINITE AIR - WORLD EDITOR TRAILER
snippet.description:
Mark McMorris Infinite Air is equipped with a feature-rich World Editor, allowing you to sculpt and craft custom runs through vast backcountry and snow parks. With numerous items to place wherever you wish, you can mold the mountain to your liking, publish your best runs online, and challenge friends to beat your high scores. 

Infinite Air is available October 25, 2016 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.
